correctness.rationale: Largely incorrect and schema‑violating. (1) Conflation of processes: the JSON is intended for PEALD‑IGZO but imports PEALD‑SiO2 GI parameters. The 0.2 s/25 s/10 s/3 s/10 s sequence and 1.2 Torr and variable N2O plasma power (100–300 W; set here as 200 W) are explicitly for SiO2 GI (Experimental 1), not for IGZO (Experimental 2). IGZO dosing/purge times, reactor pressure, and plasma power are not reported in the article. (2) Time units wrong: dosing/purge times are given with unit MilliSEC (ms) while the source reports seconds; values (e.g., 25 s) are off by 10^3. (3) SupercycleDesign incorrect: counts are populated with composition fractions (0.68:0.10:0.22) instead of integer subcycle counts; the article does not report an ALD supercycle ratio. (4) Many fields violate the schema with nulls (numericValue: None) where numbers are required: growthPerCycle.values, numberofCycles, nucleationPeriod, flowRates (all), optical/electrical properties (several), uniformity.variation, conformality.aspectRatio, roughness.value, filmDensity.value, onOffRatio, elementalConcentration.values, etc. (5) Several entries are not traceable: carrierGas and purgingGas for IGZO are set to Ar without being stated; plasmaPower is assigned (200 W) though not reported for IGZO; pressure 1.2 Torr is from the SiO2 process; dosing/purge times belong to SiO2. (6) Missing processes: the article clearly describes two ALD processes (PEALD‑IGZO and PEALD N‑doped SiO2 GI with N2O plasma 100–300 W at 250 °C, 1.2 Torr); only one process is extracted. (7) Minor content issues: co‑reactant should be “O2 and Ar plasmas” (text uses O2/Ar), substrate description omits ITO underlayers for TG‑BC, device properties provided are condition‑dependent (e.g., values correspond to GI at 100 W) but that condition is not specified. Corrections needed: split into two separate processes; remove SiO2 parameters from the IGZO process; provide only values actually reported (or omit optional fields) and ensure all required numeric fields have valid numbers with QUDT units; correct time units (seconds); do not use composition as supercycle counts; specify co‑reactant as O2/Ar if used; tie device metrics to the specific GI condition; add the SiO2 GI process with DIPAS/N2O plasma details (0.2 s/25 s/10 s/3 s/10 s, 250 °C, 1.2 Torr, Ar carrier/purge, 100–300 W).

completeness.rationale: The extraction is largely incomplete and partly incorrect relative to both the article and the schema. Key issues: (1) Multiple processes are described in the article (PEALD-IGZO active layer and PEALD SiO2 gate insulator with N2O plasma, plus a hybrid GI stack), but only one process instance is provided; the detailed PEALD SiO2 process (DIPAS precursor, 250 °C, 1.2 Torr, N2O/Ar plasma, 0.2 s–25 s–10 s–3 s–10 s sequence, 50 nm thickness, plasma powers 100–300 W, hybrid 150/300 W stack) is missing. (2) Misattribution of parameters: the dosing/exposure/purge times and pressure (0.2 s DIPAS dose, 25 s Ar purge, 10 s N2O dose, 3 s plasma, 10 s purge; 1.2 Torr) belong to the SiO2 GI process but were applied to IGZO; plasmaPower=200 W is not reported for IGZO and conflicts with the GI’s 100–300 W range. (3) Unit errors: times are labeled in milliseconds without conversion (e.g., 0.2 s reported as 0.2 ms), and those times are not reported for IGZO at all. (4) Schema violations: many numeric fields are null (None), which violates the schema and the instruction forbidding empty/null values (growthPerCycle values, numberofCycles, flowRates, nucleationPeriod, optical properties, uniformity variation, conformality aspectRatio, filmDensity, roughness, elementalConcentration, onOffRatio). (5) SupercycleDesign is incorrect: numberofSubcycles uses XRF atomic fractions (0.68:0.10:0.22) as cycle counts, which is not traceable and scientifically invalid. (6) Substrate description is incomplete/ambiguous for IGZO (device stack is ITO on 50 nm SiO2 on a base substrate); carrier/purging gas for IGZO not reported but was assumed. (7) DeviceProperties values are taken for one GI condition (e.g., VTH=-1.1 V, μFE=33.4 cm2/V·s) without specifying the associated GI plasma power and do not cover the other conditions reported. (8) Non-traceable entries: safety, filmStability, reproducibility lack support from the article. To be complete, add a separate SiO2 PEALD process (including all reported parameters and powers, and the hybrid GI stack), correct IGZO parameters (remove/adjust plasma power and pressure; provide only values stated in the article), fix units (convert s to ms if required by the schema), replace all nulls with valid QUDT-compliant numbers or omit optional fields, and correct the supercycle counts or omit them if not reported.
